author: Staff Reporter
M K
text:
Adoption camp

Humane Animal Society (HAS) has organised a free mongrel and kitten adoption camp at No. 39, 40 West Periasamy Road (opposite Rao Hospital), R.S. Puram from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. on March 20. About 50 healthy and vaccinated puppies and 20 kittens are up for adoption. Persons interested in adopting pets should bring a valid identity card and address proof. Free veterinary assistance and annual vaccination will be facilitated by HAS for these adopted pets. For details, call 9366127215, 9791532266 or 03671 44147. Persons who find puppies or kitten ready for adoption could also inform them at the above said numbers.
title: For Page-2 (Three Items)
